update x_sms_log set client_ip = #{clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, biz_id = #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, success = #{success,jdbcType=INTEGER}, err_msg = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, err_code = #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_content = #{msgContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mns_message_body = #{mnsMessageBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from x_sms_log
AND (client_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText}, '%') OR phone_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText}, '%'))
AND client_type = #{params.clientType}
AND success = #{params.success}
AND (create_time <= #{params.endTime} AND create_time >= #{params.startTime})
ORDER BY create_time DESC
